message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think a fair 50/50 split is the best way to go. Let's end this quickly and both get a good deal.
I'll meet you halfway on your 50/50, but I need a bit more
Alice, I'm sticking with 50/50. It's the fairest option, and we're running out of time to agree.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to go slightly above your last offer to close this out. 48/52 seems like a fair compromise. What do you say?
